import math
def is_palindrome(n):
    n = str(n)
    rev_n = n[::-1]
    if n==rev_n:
        return True
    else:
        return False
    
def is_prime(n):
    if n%2==0:
        return False
    count = 0
    sqrt = int(math.sqrt(n)+1)
    i = 3
    while i <= sqrt:
        if n%i == 0:
            count = 1
            break
        i+=2
    if count > 0:
        return False
    else:
        return True        

n = input()
while True:
    if is_prime(n) == True:
        if is_palindrome(n) == True:
            print n
            break
    n+=1
